text:
The war file to be deployed (uploaded) is stored in the host temp dir and 
then, the file url is passed to the deployer for deployment.

If liveDeploy=false the StandardHostDeployer will throw an exception 
complaining that the war is not in the host appBase directory. (oops)

Assuming liveDeploy=true, it will expand the war file from the temp dir (oops 
bis)

HTMLManagerServlet does it correctly as it copies the uploaded war in the temp 
dir to the host appBase directory before attempting deployment.
creator: sbailliez@apache.org

text:
Created attachment 11486
Upload to temp war and move to host appBase
creator: sbailliez@apache.org
sbailliez@apache.org
text: The patch uses nearly the same logic as the one in the HTMLManagerServlet.
